metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37049 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The component tcpprep in Tcpreplay v4.4.1 was discovered to contain a heap-based buffer overflow in parse_mpls at common/get.c:150. NOTE: this is different from CVE-2022-27942.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
